input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone (GSM Factory Unlocked) - Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU, 4GB, 5MP Camera, 3G 900/2100 MHz, International Version - White

Item specifications:
Quad Band 2G, 3G HSDPA 900/2100 MHz
Dual SIM Support, Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU, 4.3 Inch TFT capacitive touchscreen
768MB RAM, 4GB ROM, Support microSD Slot
5MP Rear Camera + LED Flash, with autofocus, Geo-tagging, touch focus
1800 mAh Battery, Bluetooth, GPS, WiFi, Android 4.3 Jelly Bean
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Springrose 90 x 132 Inch Commercial Grade Heavy Duty Black Polyester Rectangle Tablecloths are made from high-quality polyester fabric. These durable tablecloths are built to last and are perfect for any event, from weddings and banquets to anniversary parties and receptions. The black color is versatile and can be used to complement any decor. These tablecloths are machine washable and easy to care for, making them a convenient choice for busy event planners. With dimensions of 90" x 132", these tablecloths are the perfect size for most rectangular tables. These tablecloths come in a pack of 10, making them a great value.
input_text.Response B: The Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 is a 4.3" Android smartphone that runs on a Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU. It has 4GB of internal memory and supports a microSD card up to 32GB. It comes with a 5MP rear camera with LED flash, autofocus, and touch focus, along with a front-facing 1.3MP camera. It has a 1800 mAh battery, Bluetooth, WiFi, and 3G 900/2100 MHz connectivity. It comes in white and is an international version (GSM unlocked) that is compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but not CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint. Please note that this phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
